entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young boy who is special and famous. He is described as sleeping inside his blankets on the step of number four Privet Drive.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: The street where Harry Potter lives with his relatives, the Dursleys. It is described as a quiet and tidy place under the inky sky.

entities.name: mrs dursley
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who is described as screaming when she opens the front door to put out the milk bottles.

relationships.description: Harry Potter lives on Privet Drive, as indicated by the fact that he is sleeping on the step of number four.
Harry Potter's aunt, Mrs Dursley, is mentioned as screaming when she opens the front door to put out the milk bottles.
